Title: Episode 2
Plot: Nicola Murray MP has only been secretary of state for just over a week, but already there is press speculation on how long she will last. And now someone at the Department of Social Affairs and Citizenship has completely wiped the immigration records of 170,672 people. Who's going to get the blame, who will have to break the news to Malcolm and how will Nicola get through lunch with the staff of the Guardian without revealing the scale of the latest disaster?
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Writer: Ian Martin, Jesse Armstrong, Roger Drew, Will Smith
